entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Sioux Lookout
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:20 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Drizzle, -0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sioux Lookout Airport 11:00 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Drizzle
Temperature: -0.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -2
Dewpoint: -1.0°C
Wind: S 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of freezing drizzle or flurries changing to 40 percent chance of flurries near noon. Risk of freezing drizzle this afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Low minus 7. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of freezing drizzle or flurries changing to 70 percent chance of light snow overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 6. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of light snow early in the morning then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023
